fims.metadata: This list of properties, validation rules, and definitions were generated by an automated script that parsed information from the Informatics Team's Field Matrix Spreadsheet. You may un-check desired fields or check any other field on the list but may not un-check mandatory fields.

entity.attribute:
DwC_Ext: Controlled vocabulary: “not required”, “yes”, “no”, “unknown”
Biocode: no or NULL "accessBenefitSharing" = DwC_Ext, "PublicAccess" = Biocode.backend, Select from lookup list. Yes or No

DwC_Ext: Date until ordering of sample is blocked, year-month-day (e.g. 2012-10-26)
ABCDDNA: in case the DNA sample is blocked until a specific date it's nevertheless searchable but customers cannot order it. "blockedUntilDate" = DwC_Ext, YYYY MM DD ex. 2014 08 26

IndoPacific: Please include any permit information (agency, permit#, etc) as a text string "permitInformation" = IndoPacific Template v7, "Permit_Info" = Biocode Backend, "Permit_Info" = Biocode Batch Upload, "permit_info" = Plantbarcodes.plot, "permit_info" = Plantbarcodes.individual, Free text

DwC: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, global unique identifier, URI) of media associated with the Occurrence. Example: "http://arctos.database.museum/SpecimenImages/UAMObs/Mamm/2/P7291179.JPG". For discussion see http://code.google.com/p/darwincore/wiki/Occurrence http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/associatedMedia
ABCDDNA: the complete path to your image; you can provide as much multimedia items as you want.
Biocode specimen: 1 = photo in CalPhotos "associatedMedia" = DwC, "associatedMedia" = IndoPacifc Template v7, "DarImageURL" = EMuDwC, "MultiMediaObject/FileURI" = ABCDDNA, "photo" = Biocode.Taxonomy, "photo" = Botany - Acevedo, "pic" = Biocode Backend.specimen, "Photograph" = Kress PB tblKresFile, Free text

IndoPacific: A platename where the DNA extract is stored "Plate" = Fishes, "Plate" = LAB Field Collection Spreadsheet, "Plate" = BOLD Batch Upload (Amy's)?, "plate_no" = Plantbarcodes.extractions, "plate_no" = Plantbarcodes.tissue, "Plate No." = Plantbarcodes Coll'n SS, "plateID" = IndoPacific Template v7, Free text

DwC_Ext: preservationDate- Day/Month/year (e.g., 2012-10-26T18:35:27)
YYYY MM DD ex. 2014 08 26

DwC_Ext: medium used for preservation, e.g. “70% ethanol”, “95-100% ethanol”, “DMSO-salt solution”, “RNAlater”, “Formalin”, “no preservative”, “frozen”, “liquid nitrogen”, “silica gel”, “other”)
Free text

DwC_Ext: storage temperature (degrees C), e.g. “20”, “4”, “-20”, “-80”, “-150”
A numeric value in degrees centigrade

attribute.dataFormat: Lastname, FirstInitial. SecondInitial. Ex.: Darwin, C. R. (with spaces)

entity.attribute: Biocode: Part of 96 well plate number "Well" = Biocode "wellID" = IndoPacific Template v7, Free text
